hanzi: 天空中的光是蓝色和绿色的，像魔法一样缓慢地移动着。
pinyin: tiān kōng zhōng de guāng shì lán sè hé lǜ sè de ， xiàng mó fǎ yī yàng huǎn màn de yí dòng zhe 。

sentence: I can see the trees growing along the shore.
hanzi: 我能看见岸边长着树木。
pinyin: wǒ néng kàn jiàn àn biān zhǎng zhe shù mù 。

sentence: The air is crisp and fresh, and the night sky is clear.
hanzi: 空气清新，夜空清澈。
pinyin: kōng qì qīng xīn ， yè kōng qīng chè 。

sentence: There is one last leaf left hanging from the barren tree.
hanzi: 这棵光秃秃的树上还剩下最后一片叶子。
pinyin: zhè kē guāng tū tū de shù shàng hái shèng xià zuì hòu yī piàn yè zǐ 。

sentence: This summer my family is going on a long walk around the lake.
hanzi: 今年夏天我们全家要绕着湖长时间散步。
pinyin: jīn nián xià tiān wǒ mén quán jiā yào rào zhe hú cháng shí jiān sàn bù 。

sentence: One of his eyes was purple and the other one was blue.
hanzi: 他的一只眼睛是紫色的，另一只是蓝色的。
pinyin: tā de yī zhī yǎn jīng shì zǐ sè de ， lìng yī zhī shì lán sè de 。

sentence: It seems like it used to rain almost every day when I was a child.
hanzi: 当我还是个孩子的时候，似乎每天都在下雨。
pinyin: dāng wǒ hái shì gè hái zǐ de shí hòu ， sì hū měi tiān dōu zài xià yǔ 。

sentence: The sea covers a larger part of the earth.
hanzi: 海洋覆盖了地球的很大一部分。
pinyin: hǎi yáng fù gài le dì qiú de hěn dà yī bù fēn 。

sentence: The bushes surround the forest, creating a boundary that protects the landscape.
hanzi: 灌木丛环绕着森林，形成了保护景观的边界。
pinyin: guàn mù cóng huán rào zhe sēn lín ， xíng chéng le bǎo hù jǐng guān de biān jiè 。

sentence: The bees love to suck on the nectar of flowers.
hanzi: 蜜蜂喜欢吸食花蜜。
pinyin: mì fēng xǐ huān xī shí huā mì 。

sentence: These type of red rocks are rarely found, you have to be extremeley patient while digging.
hanzi: 这种类型的红色岩石很少被发现，在挖掘的时候你必须非常耐心。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng lèi xíng de hóng sè yán shí hěn shǎo bèi fā xiàn ， zài wā jué de shí hòu nǐ bì xū fēi cháng nài xīn 。

sentence: Ocean waves were very high that day years back.
hanzi: 几年前的那天海浪很高。
pinyin: jǐ nián qián de nà tiān hǎi làng hěn gāo 。

sentence: Dark clouds part, allowing the suns rays to enter once again.
hanzi: 乌云散开，让阳光再次进入。
pinyin: wū yún sàn kāi ， ràng yáng guāng zài cì jìn rù 。

sentence: Sunshine in the northern part of the country seems a lot different from the south.
hanzi: 这个国家北部的阳光似乎与南部有很大的不同。
pinyin: zhè gè guó jiā běi bù de yáng guāng sì hū yǔ nán bù yǒu hěn dà de bù tóng 。

sentence: Shrubs are pretty much always seen growing all over the forest floor.
hanzi: 森林地面上到处都是灌木。
pinyin: sēn lín dì miàn shàng dào chù dōu shì guàn mù 。

sentence: Did you ever climb up that super tall hill behind that one tree?
hanzi: 你爬过那棵树后面的那座超高的山吗?
pinyin: nǐ pá guò nà kē shù hòu miàn de nà zuò chāo gāo de shān ma ?

sentence: It's too far, we cannot walk there now, it's too late.
hanzi: 太远了，我们现在走不过去，太迟了。
pinyin: tài yuǎn le ， wǒ mén xiàn zài zǒu bù guò qù ， tài chí le 。

sentence: I like making this place mine, keeping it clean and fresh for anyone who comes by.
hanzi: 我喜欢把这个地方当作我的地盘，为任何路过的人保持干净和新鲜。
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huān bǎ zhè gè dì fāng dāng zuò wǒ de dì pán ， wéi rèn hé lù guò de rén bǎo chí gàn jìng hé xīn xiān 。

sentence: Look, the fire is blue right now, that is so cool!
hanzi: 看，现在火是蓝色的，太酷了!
pinyin: kàn ， xiàn zài huǒ shì lán sè de ， tài kù le !

sentence: Have you ever tried making a fire all on your own?
hanzi: 你试过自己生火吗?
pinyin: nǐ shì guò zì jǐ shēng huǒ ma ?

sentence: You never actually see trees growing, they grow too slowly.
hanzi: 你根本看不到树在生长，它们生长得太慢了。
pinyin: nǐ gēn běn kàn bù dào shù zài shēng cháng ， tā mén shēng zhǎng dé tài màn le 。

sentence: And so I kept dreaming like it was real life.
hanzi: 所以我一直梦想着这是真实的生活。
pinyin: suǒ yǐ wǒ yī zhí mèng xiǎng zhe zhè shì zhēn shí de shēng huó 。
